title: Franchise Tags and Tom Curran on Tom Brady's Tough Sitch
itunes:title: Franchise Tags and Tom Curran on Tom Brady's Tough Sitch
description:
A room filled with heroes - Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Marc Sessler and Chris Wesseling bring you all of the latest news around the NFL including Ngakoue wanting out of Jacksonville (9:00), the Bengals plan with A.J. Green (13:29), and the Edelman and Brady courtside drama(35:33) . Patriots Insider Tom Curran comes on the show to discuss Tom Brady's future. (38:31)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
